1.0.name: wordpress/mass-email-to-users
1.0.description:
Mass Email To Users is plugin for send mass email to wordpress users.Admin can send a email wordpress users together.

Simple and mass mailer plugin.Admin can have option pagination in list all users.Admin can send html email to selected users.

In pro version admin can have Full wysiwyg editor available for typing email.

Find Mass Email Pro Plugin at Advanced PHP Scripts

=Features=

  1. select users and email them.

  2. Seprate emails send.

  3. pagination for more users.

=Pro Version Features=

1.Full wysiwyg editor available for typing email.

2.Admin can send email with unsubscribe link.

3.User can unsubscribe from all email messages.

4.Admin can search user with email,username,user nice name and user display name.

5.Admin can use extra place holde
